title: Jersey Channel Islands
summary:
We work to supply securities and cash management services to international corporations, wealth management services to private clients.
We also have financing capability from local branch for corporate as well as TTS business. The branch has a sizeable offshore loan book and managed in-line with local rules and regulations.
tag-2: Citi Jersey has had a presence in the Island since 1969 and today employs over 80 people locally.
